message:
Add API endpoints for deck and voice management

- GET /api/decks - list all visible decks (system + user's)
- GET /api/decks/{id} - get deck with voices
- POST /api/decks - create new user deck
- PUT /api/decks/{id} - update deck (owner only)
- DELETE /api/decks/{id} - delete deck (owner only, cascades)
- POST /api/decks/{id}/fork - fork deck (usually system deck)
- POST /api/voices - create voice in user deck
- PUT /api/voices/{id} - update voice (owner only)
- DELETE /api/voices/{id} - delete voice (owner only)
- POST /api/voices/{id}/fork - fork voice to user deck

All endpoints require authentication via Bearer token.
Pydantic models for request validation.
Updated startup documentation to list new endpoints.
